name: cnc
description: A web-based interface for CNC milling controller running Grbl or TinyG2.

packageJSON.name: cncjs
packageJSON.description: A web-based interface for CNC milling controller running Grbl or TinyG2

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run stylint

releases.name: v1.9.0-alpha.2
releases.body:
#### Bug Fixes
Fixed a bug that will accidentally remove the last connection from the connections array (2461181151592aca9b57dfd3942e214ade783cb6, resolves #128)

releases.name: v1.8.16
releases.body:
This update contains a hot fix for the 1.8.x releases

#### Bug Fixes
Fixed a bug that will accidentally remove the last connection from the connections array (4fa67aee6f6d66559ab2885ac15f5e63f1c948e8, resolves #128)

releases.name: v1.9.0-alpha.1
releases.body:
#### Important Notice

cncjs 2.0 will stop supporting Node.js 0.12 and earlier versions

#### Release Notes

This update includes improvements and bug fixes, including:
* Deprecates Node.js 0.12 (3a814ea3a3378b7d07e8835cb04bcaf64c25be20)
* Adds missing html tag (ab732d80c4d4a6483b2c705a5897e820194b341f)
* Renamed website url from https://github.com/cncjs/cncjs to https://cnc.js.org (61d4c0a91f5d0e1b036a5c6c27749567f9344228)
* Automatically controls the display of Grbl, Smoothie, and TinyG widgets (6e0c7d1fe6203234d919d91b8a6a5aae882388f8, #127) 
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/22958603/4615a026-f36b-11e6-8f32-c03a9d80d436.png)
* Reorders the Feed and Spindle override buttons (f035a694c35d7c893568048ac5e121fe07f1e4b8, #130)
* Makes it easy to differentiate between 1% and 10% (446f2efa55352343eb4edf7cdc122531ac6bf107, #130)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/22851965/e5183762-f06c-11e6-9389-8ff36b704b26.png)

* Adds support for toggling 3D view for G-code display (eb79f67ef528575d2caad5466d6e71e626c3987e, 28c1b6c178a56514c9a341065fe4ba47714955cf)

  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/22958533/dbb0d2dc-f36a-11e6-807a-5fa8ef71fe02.png)

releases.name: v1.9.0-alpha
releases.body:
This update includes improvements and bug fixes, including:
* Smoothieware support
* Resolves an issue for TinyG that 3D visualizer doesn't display correct toolhead position in inch units (#106)
* Resolves an issue that caused TinyG freeze with G2 or G3 arcs (#106)
* Prevents body from scrolling when a modal is opened (6369b15434163554023d880bdcf31461bafb6740)
* Several workflow refinements
* Bypasses security checks if the app is running in development mode or has valid credentials (89d090f5f59bb1b0124dc56fc7f6e15f59750eaa)
* Adds support for sending push notifications after command completions (7c8fb6fe320d530efa8d105c146675d8107e9b6c, #84)

  #### Command succeeded
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/22676620/7fb4c5a4-ed27-11e6-8b22-44f5bcf99b8b.png)

  #### Command failed
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/22676673/d1ad7270-ed27-11e6-843a-6301b8e81dde.png)

releases.name: v1.8.15
releases.body:
#### Bug Fixes
- UT: Fixes a bug where g-code sender tests will never finish (8bce46329d02c27037de34f18512e18408b853b5)
- Fixes a potential buffer overrun issue that newline character (\n) was not taken into consideration (c9bd1fee5db5124b163aff8fb3c70696b7dab9de, #108)
- Fix a bug of removing comments inside the parentheses in stripComments (91ea2ea80d8d69b705fbad03adcb5133b81d33b2)

#### Improvements
- Human readable messages for alarms, errors, and settings in Grbl v1.1 (4efe073bf2e14a2a2e44a55194ead6e30878afbb, #112)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/21937555/d3d154ba-d9f2-11e6-9310-c304094304ca.png)

releases.name: v1.8.14
releases.body:
#### Improvements
- Refactors g-code sender and line feeder (7d4fa30bde7290a01452d9e2b418ab98ffeb29f8)
- Responds error code with corresponding error message (260fb3daaab5578c3e9976548c0452459b3fc975, resolves #112)
- Detects the buffer size if Grbl is set to report the rx buffer (9572baea46a8e5acf2f83c4f789aab15a43cedae, resolves #115)

releases.name: v1.8.13
releases.body:
This update addresses some performance issues, including:
- Speed problem with large files on Raspberry Pi 2 (83377954b77ac84cd5c8b1aad6e11f47967ceaec, https://github.com/cheton/cnc/issues/108)
- Engraving files are not loaded when greater than 10Mb (83377954b77ac84cd5c8b1aad6e11f47967ceaec, 018bbb5adb6a7ffe0fa928558ff8ee9dbaec98c2, https://github.com/cheton/cnc/issues/111)

G-code file load time is nearly 10x faster than earlier versions.

releases.name: v1.8.12
releases.body:
This update fixes a critical bug in 1.8.11:
- Fixes an issue that caused G-code to be rendered incorrectly (0503e7c8af981ab697e8e0f05667d25927820bb0, closes #113)

releases.name: v1.8.11
releases.body:
### This release is unstable, do not upgrade to this version

---

This update contains bug fixes and new language translation, including:

#### Bug Fixes
- Fixes an issue of displaying incorrect filename on 3D visualizer (4ca10b807ea62b38e4949e216e3191383c0a6497, resolves #110)
- Resolves an issue that i18next.changeLanguage may not persist lang to browser cookies (c69a89ef35c50821d07e37e890c81e19001a587d)

#### New Language
- Magyar (Hungarian) - Contributed by Sipos Pter

releases.name: v1.8.10
v1.8.9
releases.body:
- Adds an option to the 3D visualizer that can toggle the visibility of G-code file name (d091fcc4b4869b70ea17be643ff5abf88f67408a, resolves #104)
- Displays G-code filename as text sprite on 3D visualizer (a71092b89dcfc52ff5bf025c140f129d000324ef, resolves #104)

releases.name: v1.8.8
releases.body:
This update contains bug fixes and improvements, including:
- Feature: Toggle automatically check for updates (1636fed6fca16bd9b642b1a8d58dcedae2b25569)
- Security enhancements: Secure API access with access token (35a1a15dffddf48c3a29345594c57fed062794d7, 26771d338a0eaffb24a0141f779774c348686dd8)
- Adds support for access token lifetime (e420486c03e2066e3c928653e974fc1ca3e3cac0, resolves #105)
- Changes abort behavior for Grbl and Smoothie (e2abb571c405eda21b9b4a3d7278bc9ebe998bd0, resolves #94)
- [TinyG2] Fixes a bug that 3D visualizer doesn't render G-code when uploading a G-code program from watch directory (2a2ed0b711881e53515a90db224bf98178dda245)
- Adds a "received" counter that can be used to report the exact line that caused an error while streaming a G-code program (e0f0dbcbe88b4795cba3e496494dc601f5a2b4ef, 3f42993f80f75293aabed5be5a72dff52efcd2f4)

releases.name: v1.8.7
releases.body: This update fixes some critical issues in 1.8.5 and 1.8.6: - Fixes an issue that failed to start Electron app due to a side effect of commit c9c78d9 (8a1a94be3f4015df93275c113808bce99567641d, resolves #102) - Affected releases: 1.8.5 and 1.8.6 - Resolves an issue in 1.8.6 that didn't handle the error event reported by Smoothie parser (d3705ddb729ef8706bcc85c768bc2c71ece0290f, closes #100) - Controller and workflow enhancements (ee25784ea1aef7eb7d6e1d138a837d123e5c2dd0) - Disable Run button in Alarm state - Keep workflow in a running state if the controller state is not updated in time. This may happen when using a character-counting streaming protocol to stream a tiny G-code program to Grbl.

releases.name: v1.8.6
releases.body: Adds preliminary support for Smoothieware (bbbce43c7c52bf80298cbe3c3be6af716943044d, resolves #94)

releases.name: v1.8.5
releases.body:
### Release notes
- Refactors cncengine and monitor services (49c86e49d60727950587b5a23de7f2162e88f455)
- Prevents body scrolling when opening a modal window (0b4efde2452d6858663101d5e4956147a374157e)
- Adds support for uploading G-code from a watch directory (946fd3d5ca615f37548a5b38580afdc88634f005, resolves #75, #91)

### Usage

```
 $ cnc --watch-directory /home/pi/watch
```

Instead of passing command line options for `--watch-directory` and `--allow-remote-access`, you can create a `~/.cncrc` file that contains the following configuration in JSON format:

``` json
{
  "watchDirectory": "/path/to/dir",
  "allowRemoteAccess": false
}
```

Then you can browse the watch directory to select a G-code file to load:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/20800685/4e8ccb6a-b821-11e6-93a2-64e4ed059f6a.png)

releases.name: v1.8.4
releases.body: Resolves an installation issue with react-sortablejs@"<1.2.0" and sortablejs@1.5.0-rc1 (closes #98)

releases.name: v1.8.3
releases.body:
- Implements an experimental character-counting streaming protocol for Grbl controller (73e63943f890b868655cc69e6c516509f31f713c, 5f6f6f72f415b7a55c0879a2c157e7df5ff3bf3f)
Ref. https://github.com/grbl/grbl/wiki/Interfacing-with-Grbl#streaming-protocol-character-counting-recommended-with-reservations - Resolves a layout issue with Firefox browser on Settings page (52a0948b7e0ecd03774fa5e30a97e6621fbee9a7, closes https://github.com/cheton/cnc/issues/96) - Grbl v1.1: Adds Queue Reports to display the available space of plane buffer and receive buffer (59563dd22fb85b7c80c24971123662095b49d8a3) Set `$10=2` for Grbl v1.1d (or `$10=15` for Grbl v0.9) to see planner buffer and receive buffer in queue reports. ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/20649442/5912660e-b4fb-11e6-8ff8-60b2602f5d79.png)

releases.name: v1.8.2
releases.body:
- Adds a command-line option that allows remote access to the server (5fc8e1fe31e5bbf52770603c56292d86bf272171, #48)
  
  ``` bash
  $ cnc --allow-remote-access
  ```
  
  Default whitelist:
  
  ```
  ## IPv4 reserved space
  127.0.0.0/8 # loopback addresses to the local host
  10.0.0.0/8 # Private network
  172.16.0.0/12 # Private network
  192.168.0.0/16 # Private network
  169.254.0.0/16 # Link-local address
  
  ## IPv4 mapped IPv6 address
  ::ffff:10.0.0.0/8
  ::ffff:127.0.0.0/8
  ::ffff:172.16.0.0/12
  ::ffff:192.168.0.0/16
  
  ## IPv6 reserved space
  ::1/128 # loopback address to the local host
  fc00::/7 # Unique local address
  fe80::/10 # Link-local address
  ```
- Fixes a bug of displaying wrong server address when the -H option is specified (05cc5149c57f4dc86f51cb581b7dc24e668ad3af)
- Updates uuid to version 3.0.0 (Merge PR #95)

releases.name: v1.8.1
releases.body:
#### New Language
- Japanese - Contributed by [Naoki Okamoto](https://github.com/toonaoki)

releases.name: v1.8.0
releases.body: This release adds multi-account management support to enable secure web access and web socket connections. The web interface will automatically redirect user to the Sign In page when at least one user account has been enabled in Settings > Account. Note. If you forgot your password, you can find user account settings in the `~/.cncrc` file and disable account management by setting all users to the disabled state. For example: ``` js "users": [ { "id": "......", "enabled": false, // false to disable "name": "admin", "password": "......" } ], ``` ### Sign in page ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/20375688/ac07a524-acbb-11e6-9525-746c3422a137.png) ### Settings > Account ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/20375707/d036adbe-acbb-11e6-8b3f-514c06e7c9e4.png)

releases.name: v1.7.2
releases.body:
This update contains some improvements, including:
- Grbl 1.1: New override buttons to control feed, rapid, and spindle speed (resolves https://github.com/cheton/cnc/issues/89).
  Note. This feature is not available for Grbl 0.9 or earlier versions.
  
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/20336807/fd873982-ac07-11e6-9400-eb4728c7c3d9.png)
- Update "New update available" tooltip

releases.name: v1.7.1
releases.body:
- Various translation improvements
- Refines Dashboard and About page
- [Electron] Packaging both ia32 and x64 versions under Windows x64 platform

releases.name: v1.7.0
releases.body:
This release contains new features, bug fixes, and improvements, including:

#### Preview

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/19961941/48d21bae-a1f0-11e6-955c-a92b2d457c7c.png)

#### What's New
- Grbl v1.1 support (resolves #89) - realtime feedrate and spindle speed overrides will be added later
- A new sidebar menu for future extensibility (i.e. #47, #48, #75)
- 3D view can be disabled for slow performance machines or browsers that don't have GPU hardware accerleration and WebGL support (resolves #37, #76, #86)

#### Other improvements and fixes
- Lessen visibility of completed paths (resolves #90)
- Informing when a updated version is available (resolves #75)
- Spindle widget enhancements (resolves #88)
  - Spindle speed change support
  - Coolant control (M7/M8/M9) support
- Grbl and TinyG2 controller enhancements

releases.name: v1.6.8
releases.body:
- Follows [react-validation@2.x](https://github.com/Lesha-spr/react-validation) API changes (https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/71b7d2342da92a31dab4be3a6894acf4eee2add9)
- Resolves an issue where `validateAll` is missing in react-validation@2.0.8 (see https://github.com/Lesha-spr/react-validation/issues/57)

releases.name: v1.6.7
releases.body:
This update contains improvements and bug fixes, including:
- Resolves a slow performance issue when dragging widgets (https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/c18c6b3103a9734804d25325eec0b90da854f67f)
- Fixes a bug where Grbl widget is not draggable (https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/877e89f0d6b9128f2b64f784a87ca01688b6bb1c)
- Performs dns lookup to resolve server address (https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/04efbe0e85e44c9cdab6e885877652958c78dba6)
- Updates package dependencies (https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/2d974c62ec8f2277d1bb9257680fa0044a398004)

releases.name: v1.6.6
releases.body:
This update contains bug fixes in previous versions,  including [v1.6.4](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/releases/tag/v1.6.4) and [v1.6.5](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/releases/tag/v1.6.5):
- Set default webcam disabled state to true (ddc513aa6e54f1904c14fd28cba9f7ba806bddfe)
- Resolves an issue that widget control buttons cannot work after maximizing (585dca483327759582789271124658ec97f4d723)
- New API updates for react-virtualized@8.0

releases.name: v1.6.5
releases.body:
#### Bug Fixes
- Fixes a bug where widget drag and drop cannot work due to code change side effects (e3d344ac61f7707ae0d31fad1a9ed8832fd618d5, fixes #79)

#### Enhancements
- Updates store only when necessary (ebbf1502cd102d0e1e6602e6d7a1f8b370d1dc5c)
- Refines Macro widget layout (51c94057aa85f32c78e93591b2fe7d041b1a39f1, resolves #80)
- Remembers widget minimized state (77b563a7cb23b99ecef7354e07d06872524f9e63, resolves #80)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18607316/416d0c66-7cfc-11e6-9e63-546bbd03ad36.png)

releases.name: v1.6.4
releases.body:
#### Enhancements
- Change default font size from 12px to 13px (aaa9435ca6fd958100b80694ab6604e8fe2f2ea9)
- Move the toggle units button from the Axes widget to the central toolbar (5044f629897a40ebff88eb8757b386c9332a2bc1)
- Add support for toggling between imperial and metric coordinate systems
  in the 3D visualizer (bc2acb161573fc1d50c0f061d623e3c008db2365)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18577887/43b80d14-7c1f-11e6-8448-416a3252a968.png)
- Add support for accessing from a local media source using a built-in camera or a connected webcam (469d6eb221fb79c7c02964bc54c8d5058f69f1ae, resolves #57)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18577951/a5b7e282-7c1f-11e6-9775-5b2fe8a2bd83.png)
- Add support for the 4th axis (bcc068823e93f685fba7b2045ed9c4e43ebdef31, a29eda71bc38678bf49c80240a12af66cb8cc4bf)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18577970/c7fd4dbe-7c1f-11e6-8303-56fc0456635d.png)
- [Electron] Add support for zooming in/out and resetting zoom level in the desktop app (d6a157e59c2f7e784026c73a0946c831ca24eed6, resolves #77)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18556617/7d48c914-7b9e-11e6-9c58-8c3c6ff55da0.png)

releases.name: v1.6.3
releases.body:
#### Bug Fixes

Fix an issue that drag and drop does not work after API changes (3e4ce5a42b1111b1d19712e8aff9d2b8c5c164fa, resolves #69)

releases.name: v1.6.2
releases.body:
#### New Language
- Italiano (Italian) - Contributed by [vince87](https://github.com/vince87)

releases.name: v1.6.1
releases.body: Fix an issue that the <kbd>Create Macro</kbd> action will always fail if the "macros" entry is not available in the `~/.cncrc` file (652c4e2a695c393476be6fc4fa2d87a721a4f488, resolves #61)

releases.name: v1.6.0
releases.body:
This release contains bug fixes and enhancements, including:

#### Bug Fixes
- Fix an issue that the `gcode:load` event was not fired when uploading a G-code file (b86393fb6a136bbb2595e52dd664006497707cc3)
- Correct a misspelling in the G-code widget (97dcac74cf3cc9f809a10ad0fac8d624e23fc888)

#### Enhancements
- [Webcam Widget] Add support for optical work zero adjustment 
  (fd05e27049a2d688f9d519ca20ad0a24b547d9e8, #57)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18169668/c9ab7af2-708d-11e6-94a7-8f3fc91a5961.png)
- Add macro support for storing G-code to simplify CNC workflow (#61)
  ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/18171138/791854ba-7093-11e6-97ab-05b2271ee17a.png)
- Grbl and TinyG2 controller enhancements
- Improve translations

releases.name: v1.5.4
releases.body: Bump version to v1.5.4

releases.name: v1.5.3
releases.body:
#### New Language
- Portuguese (Brazil) - Contributed by [cmsteinBR](https://github.com/cmsteinBR)

releases.name: v1.5.2
releases.body:
#### Enhancements
- Add a dropdown button to change work coordinate system G54-G59 (f2f6115b26b74d18631ca59393eed31a5f51a3fa, f6a3cb13beac7ad9d85f477b935ca5a2bbbbfbfc)
- Grbl/TinyG2 controller enhancements (d1572f8791fec12d72d2ab15d4ef226730e7a638)
- Grbl/TinyG2 widget enhancements (d8c002eabe59e898ec6aa47d5737fed2faf08f66, 0ff6e6820e3155f188014fc4c80b19aee7b4f3ab)

releases.name: v1.5.1
releases.body:
#### Bug Fixes
- Corrects the usage of NIST Path Control Modes (G61, G61.1, G64) (ad637308d1c9ad25aaf431b52695aa046ce4bc12)
- Fixes a translation issue that cannot show the controller state (379788065604d6e7605a153ec8fa43eaff6d0efd)

#### New Language
- Simplified Chinese - Contributed by [Mandy Chien](https://github.com/MandyChien) and [Terry Lee](https://github.com/TerryShampoo)

releases.name: v1.5.0
releases.body: ## Changelog - Support for [TinyG2](https://github.com/synthetos/g2) (#23) - Grbl and TinyG2 controller enhancements - Widget enhancements - Localization - Update G-code command descriptions ([i18n/en/gcode.json](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/blob/master/src/web/i18n/en/gcode.json)) - Localize controller state for Grbl and TinyG2 ([i18n/en/controller.json](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/blob/master/src/web/i18n/en/controller.json)) ## TinyG2 TinyG2 binary downloads: http://synthetos.github.io/g2/ ### Connection widget Select TinyG2 before establishing a serial port connection. ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/17425200/0d7f5c90-5afd-11e6-8294-ea570210f196.png) ### TinyG2 widget You can view the real-time status in the TinyG2 widget. ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/447801/17425204/22d46b8a-5afd-11e6-9a33-e5a805ae455e.png)

releases.name: v1.4.0
releases.body:
This release contains bug fixes, improvements, and new language translation, including:

#### Bug Fixes
- Fix an uncaught `TypeError: Cannot read property 'status' of undefined` (430d4be979f80515c4ff91eaa0795e94582c62f9, resolves #52)
- Fix an issue that widget cannot restore to its original state when dragging from one pane to another pane (60e26db7718699d3a6eeb74d86f159eb865f6a9f, resolves #52)

#### Improvements
- Add support for keyboard jogging with arrow keys (for X/Y) and pageup/pagedown (for Z) (7a67f5239ff519b4cf7167903a652824943132a2, resolves #51)
- Probing without applying tool offset (8f4111672feea2ee9c6e4c370947eb33f999b803, resolves #53)
- Add support for editing current work position and issue the `G10 L20 Px` command (dc05afd8aa80d9371daf73dd22a402bdcbeab85f, resolves #54)
- Show active state on top of visualizer widget instead of axes widget (0fd67067ea197d34a7dd2af4af936277c3c8c679)
- Improve rendering performance by removing `workPosition` and `renderAnimation` from "this.state" (2ae8ef1b534552f5382bbeb5cc93819c4d4dd386)
- Create Windows installer using NSIS instead of Squirrel
- Refactor Axes widget
- CNC controller enhancements

#### New Language
- French - Contributed by [Simon Maillard](https://github.com/maisim) and [CorentinBrul](https://github.com/CorentinBrule)

releases.name: v1.3.2
releases.body: Now you can run `cnc -vvv` to increase the verbosity to the highest level and see Grbl responses from the server console (09538a3b769f3a8191e945d00d440ad6035c3dcd, #42) **It's just for debugging purpose, not recommended for production use.**

releases.name: v1.3.1
releases.body: This update contains several fixes, including: - Minor corrections for the de resource file (1bc256ebf7cdc87cfd508e88f2fa4643d542d012) - Set webcam viewport width to 100% (e5bbd1e9f03ed425fb688934ffad62ad4a68e855) - Highlight the chosen item and the drop placeholder for sortable widgets (04cd3fda37f8dff87fe4b63b85191fdf349b706b) - Fix spelling (738954f155325a8c6a5b8f87723f5ba653f92e1a)

releases.name: v1.3.0
releases.body:
This release adds support for several languages, including:
- [Czech](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/tree/master/src/web/i18n/cs/resource.json) - Contributed by [Miroslav Zuzelka](https://github.com/dronecz)
- [German](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/tree/master/src/web/i18n/de/resource.json) - Contributed by [Thorsten Godau](https://github.com/dl9sec)
- [Russian](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/tree/master/src/web/i18n/ru/resource.json) - Contributed by [Denis Yusupov](https://github.com/minithc)
- [Traditional Chinese](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/tree/master/src/web/i18n/zh-tw/resource.json) - Contributed by [Cheton Wu](https://github.com/cheton)

#### Enhancements
- Removed "Helvetica Neue" from the font family of the 404 page (ae50e4cb81a2351939e2ffbc22b82f6fa0c0d708, fixes #45)
- Using the M-JPEG format to embed streaming video in web page with a IMG tag (82fabc2c1064bdc14530d9efff71117e6a245c19, #29, #46)

#### [FAQ](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/wiki/FAQ)
- [Webcam Streaming with Raspberry Pi](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/wiki/FAQ/#webcam-streaming-with-raspberry-pi)
- [Restream RTSP to M-JPEG](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/wiki/FAQ/#restream-rtsp-to-m-jpeg)

releases.name: v1.2.6
releases.body:
- Adjust widget styles for friendly translation (9df55eb6eeb3655b6d921496ce2f53f258c99d87, resolves #40)
- Fixes a bug fix side effect caused by https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/be4eb893f6084b8c91ec078c87b2da3bd6709376 (ddd3d904e7764fbe121e4529bd005f36bbdcaa79, fixes #43)

releases.name: v1.2.5
releases.body:
- Removes unnecessary files from the installed directory (65ee8ad120b80e529a3af10526ea849a402fdabd)
- Resizes the console window in fullscreen mode (7a843f061af44d94014fd9738e21e99578f171a7)
- Fixes #41: UI settings cannot persist in Electron app after closing the window (be4eb893f6084b8c91ec078c87b2da3bd6709376, 18ecae546f39fe39bcd2ba4201b7ce0a91015e71)

releases.name: v1.2.4
releases.body: Update i18n translation keys (resolves #40)

releases.name: v1.2.3
releases.body: Fixes an issue that Node.js v0.12 cannot start the [webappengine](https://github.com/cheton/webappengine/releases/tag/v1.1.2) server (closes #39)

releases.name: v1.2.2
releases.body: Added support for 32-bit Windows installer (931826519129c7f2c7d08d1b9c2ed16d0d1e89d6)

releases.name: v1.2.1
releases.body: Fixing a bug in Axes widget for a breaking API change with react-bootstrap (b006d746391463871c3ffb3429dd2f9fcad59a65, closes #35)

releases.name: v1.2.0
releases.body: This release contains major updates, improvements, and bug fixes, including: #### Major Updates - Rename application name from cncjs to cnc - Introduce desktop app with binary executables and installers for the following platforms: - Linux (ia32, x64): .deb installer and .tar.gz file - OS X (x64): .dmg installer - Windows (x64): .exe installer #### Improvements and Bug Fixes - Usability improvements for small screen display with device width less than 720px - Update dependencies and devDependencies in package.json - Update favicon.ico - Resolve an issue that `commander.js` will throw an error when running a packaged Electron app (https://github.com/tj/commander.js/issues/512) - Adds a fallback to Canvas renderer when WebGL is unavailable (a0321873ef0c7d6ea6cffc24699d5b5bc7ff4985, fixes #37) - Resolves an issue that Frustum.intersectsSprite is missing in three.js r76 (1fbbe4e1fdfa697541a16a4add1377e755a200a7, e970c9ef338f38b2c353f251e5c03345a9fd31f3) - Adds a dropdown menu item that can toggle toolhead animation (2f2e1643ced00551b0d7fd6a99d88651dfd09454, #37) - Fixes a bug that may fail to display web interface on mobile devices (ca905bc5adfded0a072132a784691ac13277f33c)

releases.name: v1.2.0-rc2
releases.body: - Resolves an issue that Frustum.intersectsSprite is missing in three.js r76 (1fbbe4e1fdfa697541a16a4add1377e755a200a7, e970c9ef338f38b2c353f251e5c03345a9fd31f3) - Adds a dropdown menu item that can toggle toolhead animation (2f2e1643ced00551b0d7fd6a99d88651dfd09454, #37) - Fixes a bug that may fail to display web interface on mobile devices (ca905bc5adfded0a072132a784691ac13277f33c) Safari on an iPhone 5S

releases.name: v1.2.0-rc1
releases.body: Adds a fallback to Canvas renderer when WebGL is unavailable (a0321873ef0c7d6ea6cffc24699d5b5bc7ff4985, fixes #37)

releases.name: v1.2.0-rc
releases.body: This release candidate contains major updates, improvements, and bug fixes, including: #### Major Updates - Rename cncjs to cnc for the web interface - Introduce desktop app with binary executables and installers for the following platforms: - Linux (i386, amd64): .deb installer and .tar.gz file - OS X (x64): .dmg installer - Windows (x64): .exe installer #### Improvements and Bug Fixes - Usability improvements for small screen display with device width less than 720px - Update dependencies and devDependencies in package.json - Update favicon.ico - Resolve an issue that `commander.js` will throw an error when running a packaged Electron app (https://github.com/tj/commander.js/issues/512)

releases.name: v1.1.2
releases.body:
This update includes important bug fixes for v1.1.0 and v1.1.1:
- Fix an issue that joystick buttons become broken when browser window width is smaller than 720px (462c647a34e14ddc6676c9dc52df4299b96ce1b3)
- Specify a minimum width to togglers (487320b79e68145377699214ecd54efb4e9b447b)
- Leave 15px space on left and right side to avoid overlapping with togglers (e19727b158793868f5b13c8871ce37a7d0cf9a88)
- Remove the z-index property from CSS (c126af45ca40ca5635980b160e3546c1b046bc0b)

releases.name: v1.1.1
releases.body:
- Fix an overlapping issue when a widget is in full screen mode
- Display server address at startup

releases.name: v1.1.0
releases.body:
This update contains improvements and bug fixes including:
- Responsive Navigation Bar
- Supports a minimum width of 720px to target small-screen devices
- Widgets
  - Console widget
    - Fixing an issue that the scrollbar may not automatically scroll to bottom since the scrollTop property might not an integer value with certain browsers
  - G-code widget
    - Migrated from `react-data-grid` to `react-virtualized`
- Major package updates
  - react@15.0.1
  - react-bootstrap@0.29.0
  - react-dropzone@3.4.0
  - react-sortablejs@1.0.0
  - react-virtualized@6.1.2
  - serialport@2.1.0
  - three@0.75.0
- Removed `react-hmre` plugin from production build.
- Resolved the issue of react-bootstrap/react-bootstrap#1830

#### Development Only
- Added [watchpack-ignore-node-modules.sh](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/blob/master/watchpack-ignore-node-modules.sh) as the [predev](https://github.com/cheton/cnc/blob/master/package.json) script that can prevent watchpack from watching `node_modules` directories. It can significantly increase runtime performance in development mode.

releases.name: v1.0.1
releases.body:
This update resolves a critical fix:

Google Chrome reported thousands of errors while zooming in/out a loaded G-code object.
`[.CommandBufferContext]RENDER WARNING: Render count or primcount is 0.`

Commit: https://github.com/cheton/cnc/commit/291ff3785fcad4a75a7709a805f3641cf0154c61

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body: cnc v1.0 release

releases.name: v0.15.8
releases.body:
- Fixes a bug that the `serialport:close` socket event was never fired
- Fixes a bug that will not draw full circle if both startAngle and endAngle are zero
- Refactor visualizer widget
- Add a mount point option for serving static files
- #31 Add TinyWeb support

releases.name: v0.15.7
releases.body:
This release contains bug fixes and enhancements, including:
- #34 When unknown commands, milling stops
- Replace `fixed-data-table` with `react-datagrid`
- Upgrade gcode-parser, gcode-interpreter, and gcode-toolpath
- Refactor G-code Visualizer
- Update the number of inactive widgets after removing one or more widgets

releases.name: v0.15.6
releases.body:
This release contains new features and enhancements, including:
- [x] #20 Shuttle Wheel Enhancements
  - Click on <kbd>Edit</kbd> button to configure the following values:
    - Feed Rate Range: 100-2500 mm/min (default: 500-2000 mm/min)
    - Repeat Rate: 60Hz - 1Hz (default: 10Hz)
    - Distance Overshoot: 1x - 1.5x (default: 1x)
  - Wiki: [Reduce humming sound when accelerating and decelerating](https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/wiki/User-Guide#reduce-humming-sound-when-accelerating-and-decelerating)
- [x] #29 Webcam Support
  - Click on <kbd>Edit</kbd> button to configure the url

releases.name: v0.15.5
releases.body:
#30 Fixing a bug that may lead to wrong target position in G20 (in) and G90 (absolute) modes with the following example:

```
G20 G90
G0 X1.1185 Y0.5562
Z0.0394
Z-0.0231
```

releases.name: v0.15.4
releases.body:
### New Widgets Management UI ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cheton/cnc/master/media/widgets.png) ### Shuttle Wheel Support #20
Wiki: https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/wiki/User-Guide#shuttle-wheel ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cheton/cnc/master/media/ShuttleXpress.jpg) #### Buttons - Button 2 - Select/Deselect X Axis
ctrl + alt + command + x - Button 3 - Select/Deselect Y Axis
ctrl + alt + command + y - Button 4 - Select/Deselect Z Axis
ctrl + alt + command + z - Button 5 - Switch Jog Distance (1, 0.1, 0.01, 0.001, or a custom value)
ctrl + alt + command + = #### Jog Wheel - Turn Jog Left
ctrl + alt + command + [ - Turn Jog Right
ctrl + alt + command + ] #### Shuttle Wheel Adjust the keystroke repeat rate to **10 times per second** for all Shuttle Zones except the Shuttle Zone 0. - Shuttle Zone -7
ctrl + alt + shift + 7 - Shuttle Zone -6
ctrl + alt + shift + 6 - Shuttle Zone -5
ctrl + alt + shift + 5 - Shuttle Zone -4
ctrl + alt + shift + 4 - Shuttle Zone -3
ctrl + alt + shift + 3 - Shuttle Zone -2
ctrl + alt + shift + 2 - Shuttle Zone -1
ctrl + alt + shift + 1 - Shuttle Zone 0
ctrl + alt + command + 0 - Shuttle Zone 1
ctrl + alt + command + 1 - Shuttle Zone 2
ctrl + alt + command + 2 - Shuttle Zone 3
ctrl + alt + command + 3 - Shuttle Zone 4
ctrl + alt + command + 4 - Shuttle Zone 5
ctrl + alt + command + 5 - Shuttle Zone 6
ctrl + alt + command + 6 - Shuttle Zone 7
ctrl + alt + command + 7

releases.name: v0.15.3
releases.body:
- Fixing bugs of missing keyboard shortcuts
- Add more baud rate options

releases.name: v0.15.2
releases.body:
### Keyboard Shortcuts ! - Feed Hold ~ - Resume ctrl + alt + command + h - Homing ctrl + alt + command + u - Unlock ctrl + alt + command + r - Reset ctrl + alt + command + = - Switch Jog Distance ctrl + alt + command + [ - Jog Backward ctrl + alt + command + ] - Jog Forward ctrl + alt + command + x - Select/Deselect X Axis ctrl + alt + command + y - Select/Deselect Y Axis ctrl + alt + command + z - Select/Deselect Z Axis ### ShuttleXpress Settings ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cheton/cnc.js/dev/media/ShuttleXpress.jpg) **Buttons** - Button 2 - Select/Deselect X Axis
ctrl + alt + command + x - Button 3 - Select/Deselect Y Axis
ctrl + alt + command + y - Button 4 - Select/Deselect Z Axis
ctrl + alt + command + z - Button 5 - Switch Jog Distance (1, 0.1, 0.01, 0.001, or a custom value)
ctrl + alt + command + = **Jog** - Turn Jog Right - Jog Forward/Up
ctrl + alt + command + ] - Turn Jog Left - Jog Backward/Down
ctrl + alt + command + [

releases.name: v0.15.1
releases.body:
This update contains bug fixes including:
- Fixing a bug that the `~/.cncrc` file cannot be read at startup
- Resolving an issue where G18 should select the ZX-plane, not the XZ-plane

releases.name: v0.15.0
releases.body:
### Pre-1.0-Release

This release contains updates and enhancements including:
- Doing a complete rewrite of CNC server in ES6
- CNC controller interface
- Some minor bug fixes

releases.name: v0.14.12
releases.body:
Bug fixes
- Fixing an issue that caused Connection widget not able to open port after error opening a serial port

releases.name: v0.14.11
releases.body: Adding a Toggle Display button to the Grbl widget

releases.name: v0.14.10
releases.body: Refine the UI of the Grbl widget

releases.name: v0.14.9
releases.body: Fixes a bug where the Grbl widget does not update Grbl parser state anymore

releases.name: v0.14.8
releases.body:
Connection widget
- Adding support for Auto Reconnect on startup
- Remember selected baud rate

releases.name: v0.14.7
releases.body:
- Fixing a bug where grid lines are not perpendicular in the 3D visualizer
- Restoring G-code after browser refresh

releases.name: v0.14.6
releases.body:
- Code refactoring for unit conversion
- Remember jog settings in localStorage
- #25 Append version string to the document title and the brand name

releases.name: v0.14.5
releases.body:
- Adding axis labels
- G-code visualizer enhancements

releases.name: v0.14.4
releases.body:
### Docker support

#### Docker Image Installation (x64 only)

  https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js#docker-image-installation-x64-only

``` bash
$ docker pull cheton/cnc:latest
$ docker run --privileged -p 8000:8000 --rm --name cnc cheton/cnc:latest
```

#### Docker Images

  https://hub.docker.com/r/cheton/cnc/tags/

releases.name: v0.14.3
releases.body: Addressing an issue of persistent widget settings (#22)

releases.name: v0.14.2
releases.body:
This update contains bug fixes and enhancements including:
- More drag and drop refinement
- Upload G-code files with HTTP POST method instead of using socketio-file-upload
- Provides debug mode option `--debug` or `-d`
- Bug fixes
  - Socket event listeners are not removed after calling `componentWillUnmount`

releases.name: v0.14.1
releases.body: Resolving an issue of incorrect probing result

releases.name: v0.14.0
releases.body:
This update contains new features and bug fixes, including:
- Probe support #17
- Fixing an issue where port settings cannot be loaded from the external configuration file
- Resolving an issue of encountering two children with the same key

releases.name: v0.13.6
releases.body:
G2, G3 arc move with the selected plane #10

G17 (Z-axis, XY-plane)

```
G17
G02
X0Y20
X20Y0 I0 J-20.0
```

G18 (Y-axis, XZ-plane)

```
G18
G02
X0Z20
X20Z0 I0 K-20.0
```

G19 (X-axis, YZ-plane)

```
G19
G02
Y0Z20
Y20Z0 J0 K-20.0
```

releases.name: v0.13.5
releases.body: Fixes a bug where the duration counter does not stop when the gcode finishes sending (https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/issues/14)

releases.name: v0.13.4
releases.body:
- Remember widget position (https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/issues/14)
- The default configuration file will now be loaded from `~/.cncrc`

releases.name: v0.13.3
releases.body:
- Prevent browser from loading a drag-and-dropped file outside the dropzone
- Update the style of dropzone element

releases.name: v0.13.2
releases.body:
This update contains enhancements including:
- Helical Arcs support for displaying helical thread milling in the 3D visualizer #10
  
  Helical Thread Milling Example:
  
  ```
  G17
  G20
  G91
  G01 Z-0.6533 F100. 
  G42 D08 
  G01 X0.0235 Y-0.0939 F10.
  G03 X0.0939 Y0.0939 Z0.0179 R0.0939 
  G03 X-0.1179 Y0.1179 Z0.0179 R0.1179 
  G03 X-0.1185 Y-0.1185 Z0.0179 R0.1185 
  G03 X0.1191 Y-0.1191 Z0.0179 R0.1191 F16. 
  G03 X0.1196 Y0.1196 Z0.0179 R0.1196 
  G03 X-0.1202 Y0.1202 Z0.0179 R0.1202 F26. 
  G03 X-0.1207 Y-0.1207 Z0.0179 R0.1207 
  G03 X0.1213 Y-0.1213 Z0.0179 R0.1213 
  G03 X0.1218 Y0.1218 Z0.0179 R0.1218 
  G03 X-0.0975 Y0.0975 Z0.0179 R0.0975
  ```
- Minimum FOV is set to 15 for viewing small objects
- Now uploading new G-code file will not append G-code data to current running job
- Change color values on materials

releases.name: v0.13.1
releases.body: Fixes npm package dependancy issue #18

releases.name: v0.13.0
releases.body:
This release contains new features and enhancements including:
- G28/G30 Predefined Position support https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/issues/16 
- Highlights drop zone while the dragenter event is fired
- Axes widget UI enhancements
- Adds [Cycle Start] and [Feed Hold] buttons to the quick access toolbar

releases.name: v0.12.5
releases.body: This update contains a bug fixes for #15 Zeroing axes - work coordinates

releases.name: v0.12.4
releases.body:
This update includes bug fixes and enhancements including:
- Removes feedrate control from the Axes widget 
- Fixed a bug that Grbl Quick Access Toolbar buttons are not equal height
- Upgrades Sortable to v1.4.2

releases.name: v0.12.3
releases.body: Draws G0~G3 commands with different colors

releases.name: v0.12.2
releases.body:
- Use Grbl `!` and `~` commands to immediately pause and resume current operation
- Jogging is only allowed when Grbl's active state is `Idle`

releases.name: v0.12.1
releases.body:
- Upgrades [gcode-interpreter](https://github.com/cheton/gcode-interpreter) to v0.4.0
- Refactors [GCodeRunner](https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/blob/master/web/lib/GCodeRunner.js)

releases.name: v0.12.0
releases.body:
This update contains new features and bug fixes including:
- New features
  - [x] Drag and drop support for loading G-code file
- Bug fixes
  - Autobinding breaks cleanup in `componentWillUnmount`

releases.name: v0.11.9
releases.body:
This update contains enhancements and bug fixes including:
- Highlight [Upload G-code] button
- Remember last selected port
- Bug fixes

releases.name: v0.11.8
releases.body: The visualizer widget now has fixed positioning

releases.name: v0.11.7
releases.body: Fixed a bug where the input control for changing distance may experience some loss of precision

releases.name: v0.11.6
releases.body: Resolving an issue of the web intrerface that caused high CPU usage in idle state - https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/issues/14

releases.name: v0.11.5
releases.body:
- Shows only useful information in terminal console and suppress all the "?" and "$G" responses by default - https://github.com/cheton/cnc.js/issues/14
- Continues refactoring 3D visualizer

releases.name: v0.11.4
releases.body: Refactors 3D visualizer

releases.name: v0.11.3
releases.body: Renders the engraving cutter with a brushed steel texture
